attributes.action: Call in the police to investigate and charge with fraud all MP’s to found to be wrongfully claiming for expenses on second homes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Call in the police to investigate and charge with fraud all MP’s found to be wrongfully claiming for expenses on second homes. As the money belongs to us the British taxpayer and some of the claims are nothing less than fraud and it doesn’t matter how you dress it up fraud is illegal and should be dealt with immediately.

rejection.details: The PM cannot instruct the police and CPS in this way.  Anyone can refer a matter to the police for investigation and they have the discretion whether to investigate the matter or not.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
